attributes.action: The government need to stop all airlines from leaving and landing in the uk
attributes.additional_details: the reason why should actually put this ban in place and not just a FCO advice against travel is a lot of British people our due to travel and lot airlines and travel agents getting out refunding travels money as they say the flight is still taking off
attributes.background: the government need to put a ban on all airlines leaving and landing in uk for upto 30 days
